title: Understanding Nonverbal Communication
text: Nonverbal communication involves conveying messages without words. It can include various forms of expression that are not spoken.

title: Examples of Nonverbal Communication
text: Think about how people express themselves without speaking. What actions or expressions do they use?

hintAnswer: body movements, facial expressions (called affect), and gestures. It also includes nonverbal sounds, such as sighing, laughing, humming, or chuckling
title: Identifying Nonverbal Cues
text: Consider the different ways people can communicate without using words. What are some common nonverbal cues?
choices: body movements, facial expressions (called affect), and gestures. It also includes nonverbal sounds, such as sighing, laughing, humming, or chuckling
